KMD Measurement and Data Describe and compare measureable attributes. Compare the heights of two objects. Tell when one object is taller than another object. KG Geometry Identify and describe shapes. Identify two-dimensional shapes. Identify a triangle. KG Geometry Identify and describe shapes. Identify two-dimensional shapes. Identify a rectangle.
